info.name: Goliath (2024)
info.description: Goliath species from the 2024 Player's Handbook for Aurora Builder.
info.author: Aurora Builder
Wizards of the Coast

description.p: Towering folk with giant ancestry, goliaths bear supernatural boons tied to the might of ancient giants.
Giant Ancestry. Choose one boon from your giant lineage; you can use the chosen boon a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, regaining all uses on a Long Rest.
As a Bonus Action, you magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

sheet.description: Teleport up to 30 ft to a space you can see.

description.p: When you hit a target with an attack and deal damage, you can also deal 1d10 Fire damage to that target.

sheet.description: On a hit you deal +1d10 Fire damage.

description.p: When you hit a target with an attack and deal damage, you can also deal 1d6 Cold damage and reduce the target's Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: On a hit: +1d6 Cold damages; reduce target's Speed by 10 ft until your next turn.

description.p: When you hit a Large or smaller creature with an attack and deal damage, you can give that target the Prone condition.

sheet.description: On a hit vs Large or smaller creature: knock the target Prone.

description.p: When you take damage, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by the total.
When you take damage from a creature within 60 feet of you, you can take a Reaction to deal 1d8 Thunder damage to that creature.

sheet.description: When a creature within 60 ft damages you: deal 1d8 Thunder to it.

description.p: You have advantage on any ability check you make to end the Grappled condition. You also count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity.

sheet.description: You have advantage on checks to end Grappled; you count as one size larger for carrying capacity.

description.p: 5th level. As a Bonus Action, you can change your size to Large if you're in a big enough space. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes or until you end it (no action required). For the duration, you have advantage on Strength checks, and your Speed increases by 10 feet. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

sheet.description: For 10 minutes, your size grows to Large, you have advantage on Strength checks and your Speed increases by 10 ft (end early: no action).
